content: Patience, commitment, and honing your craft are the keys to anything you want to do well, put the right work in and get the results as they come towards you. Don’t measure them, just accept the gifts you get, one like or many, and then more will come, If you are not happy with the outcomes you get then why should any more outcomes want to come your way, embrace any little ones and then more will come flying by. Treasure each one and stay humble.
